I performed crawl A and terminated crawl A on my own after several
days. I =
later decided I wanted to continue gathering content where
crawl A was term=
inated. I initated crawl B as a recovery from crawl A
using the recover.gz.=
 Upon inspection there a couple hundred files
that are duplicate across the=
 two and are non robot.txt files i.e.
index.html and other standard .html p=
ages.

m=
entioned.
